column2: infected_case_plot <- ggplot(joined_data, aes(x = date, y = daily_infected_case_rate, fill = GDP_Status)) +
labs(title = "Daily Infected Case Rate by GDP Status",
scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 month", date_labels = "%b %Y") +  # Adjust date_breaks as needed
# Bar plot for daily death rate with fewer x-axis labels
death_rate_plot <- ggplot(joined_data, aes(x = date, y = daily_death_rate, fill = GDP_Status)) +
labs(title = "Daily Death Rate by GDP Status",
scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 month", date_labels = "%b %Y") +  # Adjust date_breaks as needed
